title: (x) Old Letterpress font /Woodtype - (similar to) Antique Condensed Bold {Florian}
content:
I'm looking for the font that is from the "letterpress" in this banner. It looks like a variation of Courier but I can't find it. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [letterpressPosterWeb.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103200/http:/typophile.com/files/letterpressPosterWeb.jpg) | 106.62 KB |
author: relspeedwagon

comments.content:
Hi Arielle,

this looks like an original woodtype font. [Antique Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103200/http:/www.woodentypefonts.com/Pages/antcb.html) is pretty much spot on. Are you also looking for digital alternatives? Fontbureau has an [Antique Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103200/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AntiqueCondensed), [Wooden Type Font’s version](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103200/http:/www.fonthaus.com/fonts/woodentype/antique/wo10100) is quirkier.  
F
